Reviews.Title: Does not support Amazon instant video
Reviews.Author: Robert Johnson
Reviews.Content: Good TV but very disappointing that it does not support Amazon instant video and Samsung will not answer questions about when an app will be ready, if ever.

ProductInfo.Features:
TV, Stand, Remote, Cables, Manual, 3D Glasses (qty. 1), HDMI Cable (qty. 1)
Mega Dynamic Contrast Ratio 4,500,000:1
Auto Motion Plus 120Hz with Clear Motion Rate
Full HD 1080p resolution
One Design (.5" bezel)
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung UN55D6450 55-Inch 1080p 120Hz 3D LED
